relation: Great for these types of students
Get to know the faculty and staff, and fellow students! Malone is a great place for academic, spiritual, and social growth.
Malone is fairly expensive, but you get what you pay for. Scholarships and financial aid are available for those who cannot afford it on their own.
I like the environment of Malone, but it is always subject to the actions of the student body.

The classes are in-depth and challenging. If you're just looking to pass classes, this isn't the college for you; but if you want a challenging, enriching academic experience, I would recommend Malone.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Kimberly from Lakewood, OH 03/09/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 22 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you want to be encouraged and challenged by a community of believers, this is the place for you. You will learn how your faith in God plays out in every aspect of your life--including academics. Malone is a small school with an extremely powerful community. You will find your place among other followers of Christ at this school! Tips for prospective students Malone has rules! For example, students are not allowed in the dorms of the opposite gender on Tuesdays and Thursdays or during certain hours on other days. We also have chapel on Tuesday and Wednesday mornings, and you are required to go to 20 per semester. The University has rules such as this for very good reasons, and takes them quite seriously. So please read and consider them! Bang for the buck
